channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 14th October
item.description:
FW crack leaving drop of 22mm. 3000mm x 300mm x 22mm Stats Required Give and Take TM Next to column 30 (FW6 Cracks or Gaps)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of cardboard and branches, 14th October
item.description:
Please can you collect the cardboard and tree branches that have been dumped on princess Elizabeth Way, in the lay by near Lechmere road junction. Not sure how long its been there, I only just saw it this morning. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Quebec Drive, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branch now hanging precariously & will probably fall when windy conditions return., 14th October
item.description:
Already reported ref: 11495886 (web ref: HCF004949). The damaged branch is very long & quite high plus it straddles two pathways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Cleevelands Avenue, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping outside flats again, 14th October
item.description:
Carpet dumped outside flats in same spot as previous dumps...Been there for approximately 2 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
